system.description: The character can exploit an opening created when parrying an attack, immediately striking back at their opponent.
system.benefit: Once per Turn as a Free Action after Parrying an opponent's Attack, can make a -20 Melee Attack against that Opponent using the weapon used for parrying. This Attack cannot benefit from any ability that allows for more than one hit or attack to be made, such as Lightning Attack or Two-Weapon Fighting. The -20 penalty replaces the +10 of a Standard Attack and doesn't interact with effects like Defensive Stance.

specialAbilities.name: Parry Riposte
specialAbilities.description: Once per Turn as a Free Action after successfully Parrying, make a -20 Melee Attack against the attacker. Cannot combine with multi-attack abilities.
